## **Exercise 1: Optimize for loops**

```{r}
loop<-(1:5)*5000
approach_1 <- vector("double", length(loop))
approach_2 <- vector("double", length(loop))

for (i in 1:length(loop)){
  n=loop[i]
  #approach1
  z1 <- NULL
  approach_1[i]<-system.time(
    for (j in 1:n) {
      z1 <- c(z1, 1)
    }
  )
  
  #approach2
  z2<-vector(mode = "double", length=75000)
  approach_2[i]<-system.time(
    for (j in 1:n) {
      z2[j]<-1
    }
  )
}
```
